description: Custom React hook 'useFavorites' to fetch and cache user favorites, handle loading and error state, and provide a refetch mechanism.

methods.name: useFavorites()
methods.description: Custom React hook that manages fetching and caching user favorites, handling loading, errors, and refetching.

methods.name: fetchFavorites
methods.description: Asynchronous function that fetches favorite items from backend API if user is authenticated, updating state accordingly.

methods.name: refetch
methods.description: Function to trigger a refetch of the favorites list, useful after modifications.
